inlineContent.text: The precision of the generated window.

The number of elements to generate.
A Boolean value that specifies whether the function generates half of the number of elements.

abstract.text: Make large-scale mathematical computations and image calculations, optimized for high performance and low energy consumption.
Multiply signal data by window sequence values when performing transforms with noninteger period signals.
An enumeration that acts as a namespace for Swift overlays to vDSP.
Constants that specify window sequence functions.
Returns the absolute value of each element in the supplied single-precision vector.
